name: read_file
description: Read and return the contents of a file

filepath.description: The path to the file to read

name: write_file
description: Write content to a file (overwrites existing content)

filepath.description: The path to the file to write

content.description: The content to write to the file

safe_write.description: Use atomic write for safety (default: true)

name: create_file
description: Create a new file with optional content

filepath.description: The path to the file to create

content.description: The initial content of the file (default: empty)

overwrite.description: Overwrite if file already exists (default: false)

name: delete_file
description: Delete a file safely (moves to trash) or permanently

filepath.description: The path to the file to delete

safe_delete.description: Move to trash instead of permanent delete (default: true)

name: append_file
description: Append content to the end of a file

filepath.description: The path to the file to append to

content.description: The content to append to the file

name: list_directory
description: List contents of a directory with optional filters

dirpath.description: The path to the directory to list

only_files.description: Show only files, exclude directories (default: false)

name: move_file
description: Move or rename a file to a new location

dst.description: The destination file path or directory
